sentence.Network_en: Another was on the Bowery, which he knew contained many showy resorts.
sentence.Network_cn: 另一个在波威里街上, 他知道这条街上有很多豪华的酒店.

sentence.Network_en: Again he resorted to the Bowery lodging - house, brooding over where to look.
sentence.Network_cn: 他又回到波威里街的寄宿处, 盘算着去哪里申请救济.

sentence.Network_en: Trees made the meadow a bowery maze.
sentence.Network_cn: 树木使草原成了绿荫处处的迷宫.
